attributes.action: Give British people priority in Life in Britain
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: British people are continuously put after immigrants. Many on housing lists are delayed due to the influx of immigrants and those on NHS lists have to wait. many of the immigrants claim benefits even yhough their not paying tax. they are a thorn in the side to society

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
